post:
HostSlick.com has a simple aim. We provide our customers with high quality servers but keep prices down. We own Hardware and Network in Lelystad, Netherlands and have an average ticket response time of around 45min-1h at most of the time
Our goals are to offer our valued clients a great experience and offer the best Affordable and most Reliable Hosting arround.

Why HostSlick?

  • SSDs by default in any Server.
  • Easy-to-use Control Panels (WebHosting: cPanel, VPS: Virtualizor, Dedicated Servers: Synergycp and Permanent KVM)
  • Wide range of Payment methods accepted
  • Complimentary 100Gbps Corero SmartWalls DDoS Protection with any Dedicated!
  • Own Hardware, Network in The Netherlands. We are not resellers!
  • Network based on industry leading Juniper & Cisco Equipment
  • All Dedicated servers include IPMI/ILO4/… Full control over your Server!
  • Support On-Site for Emergencies 24x7
  • Friendly Sales/Support Staff.
  • Free IP Announcements (Have a IP range? We will announce it with NO FEE on our Cisco Router and ASN!)
  • Long-Term running business. We will not leave the market anytime soon (Guaranteed!)
  • Deep Discounts for interested Dedicated-Server resellers.

Today we proudly present a new, very limited KVM deal.

RULES:

  • ONE of this specials allowed per customer (be fair to others, give them a chance to grab one as well!)
  • Once out of stock, NO restock.
  • Be a fair user. If you run someting CPU Intensive, you are better looking for a Dedicated Server
  • No Illegal crap on our Servers. Or anything else that can get us into problems or is against law.
  • Don’t be a dick to our Support.

DEALS DEALS DEALS!
